summary: This bill, the Teachers Are Leaders Act of 2025, amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to establish a teacher leader development program. The program aims to provide professional development to teachers who maintain their classroom roles while also taking on leadership responsibilities to improve student achievement. It outlines program components like coursework, fieldwork, support from school leaders, and potential stipends. The bill also amends the existing law related to this program and authorizes appropriations for it.
